message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.AI 

This paper is about explainable recommendation systems, which is a subfield of information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG). The proposed method involves the use of a graph structure and a neural model, which are common topics in social networks (cs.SI) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper discusses the problem of cold-start recommendations, which is a common challenge in artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
